AngularJS Graph

AngularJS Dependency Graph

A Chrome extension for browsing AngularJS dependency graph

App in Chrome Web Store

Features

Update on reload

Graph is automatically reloaded as you develop your app

Sticky nodes

You can stick nodes where you want them to be.

Made with Love

This app is meant to look nice!

Zoom and pan

You can zoom and pan.

Contact

If you'd like to share some feedback, or just say hi.
